main(String[]) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Server.ServerMain
The main method to start the server application.
It initializes the server model, controller, initializes the local RMI registry, and starts the server socket and RMI listeners.
main(String[]) - Static method in class it.polimi.ingsw.Utils.AssetSerializer.AssetSerializer
Compiles and serializes all the assets required for the game into .bin files.
MainLoop - Class in it.polimi.ingsw.Server.Model.Game.Logic.States.Implementations
Represents the main loop state in the game, where players take turns to place cards and draw new cards.
This state implements the GameState interface and defines methods to handle actions during the main gameplay loop.
